findings.details: Page layout supports responsive images; some page-level featured images lack explicit fetch priority defaults.
No obvious http:// links in content/templates (excluding SVG doctype references).
Post and card microdata present; consider tightening image fetch priority for page hero images.
No automated freshness checks run; manual review recommended for older posts.

recommendations: Add explicit fetchpriority defaults for page featured images to reduce LCP competition.
Continue periodic manual review for older content.
